short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for tipping on social media platforms with HIVE tokens
short.es: Una extension de google Chrome que permite gratificar o incentivar contenido en redes sociales con HIVE tokens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A user friendly way to reward different social media posts with HIVE with minimal impact on the original UX.

V0.6.2 and all updated versions that follow guarantee a maximum level of decentralization by ensuring that your computer and browser are the tools that you are using to accomplish the tasks.

Likewise they ensure minimal usage of third party APIs.
long.es: A user friendly way to reward different social media posts with HIVE with minimal impact on the original UX.
